seniority_level.evidence: Job requires minimum 10 years experience and explicitly calls for a "Senior, hands‑on data modeler".

job_family.evidence: Title and responsibilities focus on enterprise data warehouse modeling, dimensional design, and architecture of data assets.

sub_specialty.evidence: Responsibilities include developing conceptual, logical, and physical models for an enterprise data warehouse and using Kimball dimensional modeling.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentors and educates team members and provides technical leadership of an Oracle data warehouse team, but no direct‑report responsibilities are listed.

primary_cloud.evidence: Only Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) is referenced, which is not among the allowed cloud categories (aws, azure, gcp, multi, on_prem).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job emphasizes ETL activities, dimensional modeling, and data warehouse implementation without any streaming technologies.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No workflow/orchestration tool (e.g., Airflow, Luigi, dbt) is referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions Star, Snowflake, and hybrid schemas, all of which are data‑warehouse technologies.

remote_restriction.evidence: Requirement: "Must live within 60 miles maximum from location" (Sacramento, CA).

timezone_focus.evidence: No explicit timezone or regional focus is stated beyond the Sacramento location.

relocation_required.evidence: Candidate must already reside within 60 miles; no relocation assistance is mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship status is listed as "not_mentioned" in the extraction.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility in the posting.

citizenship_required.evidence: Neither citizenship nor work‑authorization requirements are specified.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Job title includes "_W2_" indicating a full‑time employee arrangement.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Responsibilities include "Mentors and educates team members on best practices" indicating informal mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the description.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not reference internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit mention of IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Requires 10+ years experience, multiple specific Oracle tools, and a long list of mandatory hard and soft skills.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data modeling for an enterprise data warehouse.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: The skill set aligns with a senior‑level data modeling role and matches the 10‑year experience requirement.
